entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Chapleau
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:31 p.m. EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Clear this evening and after midnight then partly cloudy with periods of snow beginning before morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 6:14 PM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High zero. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:14 PM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023
